div.a: Now leasing newly renovated apartment homes!

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Located midway between Thousand Oaks and Ventura, just minutes from Los Angeles and the beauty of the Pacific coastline, Avalon Camarillo boasts a setting of beauty and centrality. Choose from well-appointed one or two bedroom apartments and spacious two or three bedroom townhouses, all featuring unparalleled amenities and California casual style. Select apartment homes include newly renovated kitchens perfect for entertaining, with beautiful quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, and more. Spend your leisure time at our landscaped barbecue and picnic areas, outdoor swimming pool, or state-of-the-art fitness center. Moreover, with easy access to shopping, dining and entertainment, you’ll never need to venture far from home. When it comes down to it, our Camarillo apartments combine comfort and luxury to form a truly unique Southern California apartment community. Add in our professional on-site management and you can see why Avalon Camarillo is such an amazing place to live in Ventura County. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. CAMARILLO APARTMENTS BY AVALON Our community of Camarillo apartments keeps all of your needs in mind so you can look forward to coming home to relax. Our residents enjoy a tranquil setting, first-rate amenities, and every convenience imaginable. As an added bonus, our apartments in Camarillo are situated near a wealth of fun attractions such as the Camarillo Premium Outlets, Channel Islands Aviation, and the Pleasant Valley Museum & Botanical Garden. CAMARILLO APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you become part of the Avalon family you will be able to avail of what we call the Avalon Advantage. This special program was created to ensure peace of mind and a wonderful living experience for our residents. From our 30-day move in guarantee to our national relocation program, we take every step possible to make our residents’ lives easier. In short, you can experience a whole new level of upscale community living in our Southern California apartment community. So what are you waiting for? Contact us to schedule an appointment and discover the best Camarillo apartments today!

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

Live Up."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}}]},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","id":"f0fJS75Hy7349Pk","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"Make Yourself at Home","description":"We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Located midway between Thousand Oaks and Ventura, just minutes from Los Angeles and the beauty of the Pacific coastline, Avalon Camarillo boasts a setting of beauty and centrality. Choose from well-appointed one or two bedroom apartments and spacious two or three bedroom townhouses, all featuring unparalleled amenities and California casual style. Select apartment homes include newly renovated kitchens perfect for entertaining, with beautiful quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, and more. Spend your leisure time at our landscaped barbecue and picnic areas, outdoor swimming pool, or state-of-the-art fitness center. Moreover, with easy access to shopping, dining and entertainment, you’ll never need to venture far from home. When it comes down to it, our Camarillo apartments combine comfort and luxury to form a truly unique Southern California apartment community. Add in our professional on-site management and you can see why Avalon Camarillo is such an amazing place to live in Ventura County. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. CAMARILLO APARTMENTS BY AVALON Our community of Camarillo apartments keeps all of your needs in mind so you can look forward to coming home to relax. Our residents enjoy a tranquil setting, first-rate amenities, and every convenience imaginable. As an added bonus, our apartments in Camarillo are situated near a wealth of fun attractions such as the Camarillo Premium Outlets, Channel Islands Aviation, and the Pleasant Valley Museum & Botanical Garden. CAMARILLO APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you become part of the Avalon family you will be able to avail of what we call the Avalon Advantage. This special program was created to ensure peace of mind and a wonderful living experience for our residents. From our 30-day move in guarantee to our national relocation program, we take every step possible to make our residents’ lives easier. In short, you can experience a whole new level of upscale community living in our Southern California apartment community. So what are you waiting for? Contact us to schedule an appointment and discover the best Camarillo apartments today!","previewWordCount":50},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fJ9AtKy7349qL","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/GXSAHEHZHFHK7KWYDH6Y5QPGIM.jpg","furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV.","imgAlt":null},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0fic6Etz7349wq","customFields":{"title":"The service.
